ygData.subject: Ice and Snow
ygData.msgSnippet: Robo, Scyther is cloaked, seeing him would be impossible. ... Killfest frowns, watching the Alliance advance on the Cybertronian Fire on the scanners.

Robo, Scyther is cloaked, seeing him would be impossible.

::Killfest/EndBringer/Demise/Scyther::

Killfest frowns, watching the Alliance advance on the Cybertronian 
Fire on the scanners.

"Allright, we're going to pull our troops back and go to another 
location. Have your troops follow mine."

He smiles. The scanners have just informed him of something very 
interesting. Very interesting indeed, yesss.... He gives an order 
over the internal communication system he had with his team.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer and Demise stop, looking at the other bots. "Hmm. They're 
planning an ambush I think. THere's another bot up there."

He points at where Megaton was. Killfest's orders come through.

"We're needed at another location. Everyone follow me."

He turns around and walks off, Demise and the cloaked Scyther 
following.
